column1: Kata Robata////My sister and I made a reservation for 5pm on a Saturday
column2: and we're really glad we did because the place filled up fast that there were people lined up at the door during our meal. So... MAKE A RESERVATION! It also might be better to call instead of going through the online system
column3: as I was able to get a time slot that wasn't listed on the website by calling. They also have happy hour deals (5-6:30 Mon-Sat
column5: which includes discounts on some appetizers
